title: Features Forced Upon Us
text:
I have been using Snapchat since 2014. Itâ€™s actually, in some cases, my preferred method of communicationâ€¦ but over the last year or so, Snapchat has been introducing features that the userbase does not like, and barring their users from providing feedback or removing the pop-ups/UI features that come with it. Most recently (and most infuriatingly): SNAPCHATâ€™S MY AI.

My AI is a ChatGPT-run program that is permanently affixed at the top of your chat feed. The ONLY way to remove it is by subscribing to Snapchat+. This is a cheap and predatory way to get users to buy in - not by adding features that users want, but by annoying them until they give in. So not only has the company been rolling out an unnecessary subscription-based model - something that no private messaging platform needs - but they engage in crude practices to get their users to buy in and remove features that we didnâ€™t ask for and donâ€™t want.

title: I enjoy it

text: I love Snapchat as an app. They do a really good job of organizing communications and connecting you to your community, but every time I update the app thereâ€™s some new thing that doesnâ€™t always look the best that I have to get used to. This time itâ€™s the â€œMy AIâ€ function. I see the appeal, but the chatbot should be an option not a requirement. At the very least, it shouldnâ€™t be pinned to the top of my chat feed. If people want it pinned they can pin it themselves. title: Non consumer friendly AI Bot
text:
I have been using Snapchat for 10+ years and the new AI Bot update has really turned me off to the point of considering deleting the app. 

It makes me so uncomfortable not to even have the choice to add this AI bot to my account, considering it learns from and uses my data. I donâ€™t even interact with it, but there should have been a choice. On top of that - there is no way to delete the bot from my account or from my chat feed. It is permanently pinned at the top of my feed with no way to get rid of it! So irritating when I have chats with people I care about, and actually want to keep in touch with, now below this AI bot. 

Iâ€™ve read the only way to delete the AI Bot from your chat feed is if you have Snapchat+ and even then you canâ€™t permanently delete itâ€¦ like please. I seriously hope Snapchat reconsiders this awful feature, or they may be losing many loyal users, myself included.

title: Censoring Content
text: Snapchat works when it wants to work. Right now as we speak itâ€™s not showing me my text while writing this review. I have the screenshot to prove it. title: Snapchat is their own worst enemy
text: This company clearly doesnâ€™t care what itâ€™s users actually want/need out of this app. Originally, Snapchat had a good thing going. And then they added AI. No one wants this feature on their Snapchat, especially now that it has access to all our conversations and photos. It is a complete invasion of privacy and the only way to â€œget rideâ€ of AI is to literally pay money. Whoever at snapchat is making these decisions and agreeing to them should not be working for an app that deals with peoples private pictures and conversations. If they are wanting to jump into the AI industry they should work for a more public social media company that doesnâ€™t focus more on one-on-one private conversations and pictures more than anything else or an actual AI company. This app has become such a complete joke. If they continue down this road theyâ€™re going to run themselves into the ground.

title: STOP UPDATING
text: Snapchat has been a platform I have used for a long time to chat with friends. But over the last couple of months it has just gotten worse and worse.
